items.sentence: I saw a fishing boat about a mile off the shore.

I studied really hard in order to pass the exam.
Tom dropped his coffee cup on the kitchen floor.
Tom dropped me off at school on his way to work.
Tom dropped out of college when he was a junior.
Tom dropped out of school to support his family.
Tom sat on the beach all day, writing postcards.
Tom sat on the porch, reading the evening paper.
Tom might\'ve fooled you, but he won\'t fool me.
It began to snow heavily as I got off the train.
It has been over three years since I moved here.
It started to rain as soon as we started eating.

We\'ve known about this problem for a long time.
What\'s the best way to get to Boston from here?

I told Tom that I needed to go home early today.
